definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
Cao Pi (187-226), second son of Cao Cao 曹操, king then emperor of Cao Wei 曹魏 from 220, ruled as Emperor Wen 魏文帝, also a noted calligrapher

sentences.english: Phinees our father, by being fervent in the zeal of God, received the covenant of an everlasting priesthood.
sentences.chinese: 我們的祖先丕乃哈斯因爲熱誠，才獲永爲司祭的盟約。

sentences.english: Oh, Peter. You know Idon't like to fly.
sentences.chinese: 唉，丕特，你知道我不喜歡坐飛機的。

sentences.english: But Phinehas stood up and intervened, and the plague came to an end.
sentences.chinese: 丕乃哈斯奮起調停，這災禍才止息平定。

sentences.english: Recognizes that Bo was in Da-pi, many problems in Shang history will be explained perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 亳在大亻丕，則商史許多問題皆可以通解。

sentences.english: Recognizes that bo was in da-pi many problems in shang history will be explained perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 亳在大亻丕，則商史許多問題皆可以通解。

definition: to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
numerous/common people (or populace)/born of a concubine
